newsitem.title: CANADA: BioChem Pharma plans 2-for-1 stock split.
newsitem.headline: BioChem Pharma plans 2-for-1 stock split.

text.p: BioChem Pharma Inc said on Wednesday that its board of directors approved a two-for-one split of its outstanding common stock.
The split is subject to approval by regulatory and stock exchange authorities and will take effect April 7.

As a result of the stock split, the number of outstanding shares of the company's common stock will increase to approximately 108 million. The stock split is intended to broaden the stockholder base and to increase the liquidity of the company's shares, BioChem Pharma said.
